author: felicity
msg: bug 2437: make the code to figure out the autolearn score be in a single function and not scattered around PMS.  Also, properly ignore noautolearn, userconf, and learn rules instead of just noautolearn.  also, don't shift the global scoreset when figuring out whether to autolearn, just use a local scoreset copy.
